name: Prey r (lucky Fox)
description: Hello! I would like to tell you about my game Prey r. this is a post-apocalypse survival game, after a solar flare, I think it's worth a look! Already done: inventory system, item crafting, tree felling and partial saving of game data And a partial translation of the game into English and Russian, but the native language of the game is Ukrainian. Link to the game server in discord: https://discord.gg/DGwbCfhHE9.
